name: "Crash of the Titans" - "A Zero's Journey" Trivia Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where is the mojo room located in this level?
questions.explanation:
A statue's mouth.

	The mojo room is in a statue's mouth after a few stepping stones.  You must be careful while using the stepping stones, as you will die if you fall in the acid-like water.  The mojo room is blue, like all mojo rooms, and this mojo room does not require you to click O to access it.  Simply jump in.

questions.text: Are there any Goars in this level?
options: Yes, in the mojo room and final battle
questions.explanation:
Yes, in the mojo room.

	The only Goars that appear in this level are in the mojo room.  You are not able to enter the temple until the next level, so the battle does not happen until the next level.

questions.text: How many Snipes must you fight by the red door?
questions.explanation:
Two.

	You must only defeat two Snipes, but make sure you jack one for later.  You are going to need it.

questions.text: What does Aku Aku say the Mojo Temple looks like?
questions.explanation:
Texas Mojo Repository.

	Aku Aku says the mojo room looks like a Texas Mojo Repository, but he never tells you exactly what that is.  The temple is a giant monkey with several arms and Cortex is on top draining the mojo.

questions.text: How many arms are on the temple?
questions.explanation:
Four.

	The giant monkey has four arms.  Two of these arms hold staffs.  The other two hold a bowl on the monkey's head.

questions.text: How many teeth are on the statue?
questions.explanation:
Five.

	There are five teeth total.  You enter the temple at the end of the level, and actually find yourself inside in the next level.  There are two teeth on top and three teeth on the bottom.

questions.text: Are you able to see the feet of the temple?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	You are able to see the feet of the giant monkey, who sits at the end of the path for you to enter.  He has only three toes on each foot, for a total of six toes.

questions.text: Do you ever enter the temple during this level?
questions.explanation:
No.

	You never actually enter the temple, as that is saved for the next level.  The level ends once you have gotten to the doorway of the temple.  The doorway is the monkey's mouth, with giant teeth.

questions.text: How many bad guys must you defeat to get the minion master?
questions.explanation:
Eighty.

	The eighty bad guys you must defeat are still Ratnicians.  The Ratnician is the first bad guy you come across in the entire game.  He is first found in level one in the cave.

questions.text: What does the locked voodoo doll of this level take to unlock it?
questions.explanation:
Complete 50% of the game.

	This level's only locked voodoo doll will be unlocked when 50% of the game has been completed.  Jacking 30 Goars, 50 Snipes, and defeating 200 Ratnicians are locked voodoo dolls for other levels.
